articles.author: Gabriel Gavin
articles.title: Russia to seize energy assets from 'unfriendly' European countries - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Kremlin’s cash grab could leave German and Austrian firms out of pocket.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed decrees granting his government power to confiscate and forcibly sell off billions of dollars worth of assets belonging to European energy firms to new sta… [+2188 chars]
